src:
侍のサブマリン・高橋礼が圧巻投球　五回まで完全　１２／１５が内野ゴロ

06 Nov 2019

　「プレミア１２・１次ラウンド、日本－プエルトリコ」（６日、桃園国際野球場）
　先発のサブマリン・高橋礼（ソフトバンク）は圧巻の投球。五回までひとりの走者も許さず、１２のアウトを重ねた。
　直球、スライダー、シンカーでタイミングを外し、１５アウトのうち１２個が内野ゴロ。相手打線を翻弄（ほんろう）して外野に飛ばすことすらさせず、リズム良く味方の攻撃につなげた。
text:
Samurai's submarine, Rei Takahashi throws a masterpiece, complete up to 5 times, 12/15 is Uchino Goro

06 Nov 2019

"Premier 12.1 Round, Japan-Puerto Rico" (6th, Taoyuan International Baseball Stadium)
The starting submarine, Rei Takahashi (Softbank) is a masterpiece. No more than one runner was allowed up to five times and repeated 12 outs.
・ ・ ・ Take off the timing with straight ball, slider, sinker, and 12 out of 15 outs are infield. He did not even flick the opponent's batting line and fly to the outfield, leading to a friendly attack with his rhythm.
